com.revolsys.io.xbase

Class XbaseDatasetReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.revolsys.io.AbstractObjectWithProperties
      • com.revolsys.io.AbstractReader<T>
        • com.revolsys.data.io.AbstractDirectoryReader<Record>
          • com.revolsys.data.io.RecordDirectoryReader
            • com.revolsys.io.xbase.XbaseDatasetReader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RecordDefinitionFactory, ObjectWithProperties, Reader<Record>, AutoCloseable, Iterable<Record>, Iterator<Record>

    public class XbaseDatasetReader
extends RecordDirectoryReader

    The XbaseDatasetReader is a RecordIterator that can read .dbf data files contained in a single directory. The reader will iterate through the .dbf files in alphabetical order returning all features.

    See the AbstractDirectoryReader class for examples on how to use directory readers.

    Author:
    Paul Austin
    See Also:
    AbstractDirectoryReader
